title: How to Get HM Cut in Pokémon X and Y

steps.title: Get to the point in the game where you've beaten the Santalune City gym.
steps.content: Get to the point in the game where you've beaten the Santalune City gym. [2] X Research source

steps.title: Go to Camphrier Town.
steps.content: Go to Camphrier Town. From there, take the west exit to reach Route 7. [3] X Research source

steps.title: At the split, go north until you reach Palais Lane.
steps.content: At the split, go north until you reach Palais Lane.

steps.title: Go north through Palais Lane until you reach the Parfum Palace.
steps.content: Go north through Palais Lane until you reach the Parfum Palace.

steps.title: Go to the gate, and pay the man 1000 Pokédollars to open the gate to the palace.
steps.content: Go to the gate, and pay the man 1000 Pokédollars to open the gate to the palace. [4] X Research source

steps.title: Go into the palace.
steps.content: Go into the palace. Go through the doors in the middle to enter the garden.

steps.title: Go over the bridge, and from the statue, go west until you reach a maze.
steps.content: Go over the bridge, and from the statue, go west until you reach a maze. [5] X Research source

steps.title: Go into the maze, and go north until you reach a split.
steps.content: Go into the maze, and go north until you reach a split. Go right, and you'll find a yellow Poké Ball which contains Cut.
